text: anguruwathota, madurawala pradeshiya sabhawe e.ja.ni.sa manthriwarun kandayama maha marga ha waraya wyapruthi amathya nirmala kothalawala mahathagen karana lada illimak anuwa balapradeshaye sama grama niladhari wasamakama athi siyaluma gramiya marga prathisanskaranaya kirima sandaha laksha 2000ka mudalak labadi thibe.me mudal prathipadanaya yatathe pradeshaye sama dushkara margayakma danata prathisanskaranaya wemin pawathina athara, eewaye siyalu idikirim katayuthu idiri masa deka thuladi awasan kirimata niyamithaya..
